name: Snickerdoodles
ingredients: 1 c. butter 2 tsp. cream of tarter
1 ½ c. sugar 1 tsp baking soda
steps: Cream butter and sugar. Add eggs and mix until well blended. Combine all dry ingredients and add gradually until
smooth. Roll into 1 in. balls and roll in cinnamon/sugar mixture. Bake at 400 degrees for 8-­‐10 min.
